overview: For over 15 years, Mr. Will Andrich has been active in Investment Banking and Finance, working in London, New York, San Francisco and Moscow with Morgan Stanley and LCF Rothschild. He set up New Europe Real Estate Fund and Astor Capital Group. Mr. Andrich served a Board Member of a Russian development company PIK Group and carried out IPO of the Group - one of the most successful IPO in the real estate sector. Currently he serves as a President of Astor Capital Group and is a co-founder of oil and gas company VAL Energy. Mr. Andrich has his MBA from UC Berkeley and holds a CFA charter.
